definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: The thirsty wayfarer was glad to find a fresh spring near the road.
sentences.chinese: 口渴的徒步旅行者很高興在路邊找到新鮮的泉水。

sentences.english: The shabby houses used to range along the road.
sentences.chinese: 過去這路邊破敗的房子排成行。

sentences.english: You will see Gypsies begging beside the road, but do not give them any money.
sentences.chinese: 你會看到吉普賽人在路邊乞討，但是不要給他們錢。

sentences.english: The radius of curvature of road should be considered while making plant design of the road.
sentences.chinese: 道路邊的植物種植，應考慮道路的曲率半徑。

sentences.english: The Charter scheme is expected to help enhance vehicle safety and improving roadside air quality.
sentences.chinese: 預期約章計劃有助提高車輛安全和改善路邊空氣質素。

sentences.english: The dawns on the top of that mountain are impressive.
sentences.chinese: 長夜躺在你的路邊，黎明在朦朧的山後睡眠。

sentences.english: The farmer secretly hid the yellow dirt which was picked up by the roadside.
sentences.chinese: 這個農民把在路邊撿到的黃金悄悄地藏了起來。

sentences.english: The battle broke out after international troops struck a roadside bomb in Wardak province.
sentences.chinese: 戰鬥爆發後，國際部隊在瓦爾達克省的路邊炸彈襲擊。

sentences.english: Into the jungle of weeds that formed a natural fence along the road.
sentences.chinese: 他走進了路邊的天然屏障，走進了雜草叢生的樹林裏。

sentences.english: He hit his forehead against the kerb when he fell.
sentences.chinese: 他摔倒時額頭碰在了路邊鑲邊石上。

sentences.english: She was listening to her cassette tape when she suddenly saw a man standing on the side of the road.
sentences.chinese: 她正聽着卡式錄音磁帶，突然看見一個男人站在路邊。

sentences.english: If you feel drowsy while you are driving, you should pull over and rest a while.
sentences.chinese: 你若開車時很困，就應停靠路邊休息一下。

sentences.english: He sees a pharmacy on the side of the road, so he stops his scooter and walks inside.
sentences.chinese: 他在路邊看到一家藥局，於是他停下車走了進去。

sentences.english: Every time he saw a lawyer walking along the road, he would swerve to hit him.
sentences.chinese: 每當他看見有律師在路邊走，他就會調轉車頭撞過去。

sentences.english: The elephant was standing eight yards from the road, his left side towards us.
sentences.chinese: 那頭象站在路邊八碼遠的地方，左側朝着我們。

definition: to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
